## More Information

You can learn more about creating custom Typst templates here:

<https://quarto.org/docs/prerelease/1.4/typst.html#custom-formats>

```{=typst}
#import "@preview/tablex:0.0.8": tablex, rowspanx, colspanx

#align(center+bottom)[
#figure(
tablex(
  columns: 4,
  align: center + horizon,
  auto-vlines: false,
  caption: [Probe results for design A],

  // indicate the first two rows are the header
  // (in case we need to eventually
  // enable repeating the header across pages)
  header-rows: 2,

  // color the last column's cells
  // based on the written number
  map-cells: cell => {
    if cell.x == 3 and cell.y > 1 {
      cell.content = {
        let value = int(cell.content.text)
        let text-color = if value < 10 {
          red.lighten(30%)
        } else if value < 15 {
          yellow.darken(13%)
        } else {
          green
        }
        set text(text-color)
        strong(cell.content)
      }
    }
    cell
  },

  /* --- header --- */
  rowspanx(2)[*Username*], colspanx(2)[*Data*], (), rowspanx(2)[*Score*],
  (),                 [*Location*], [*Height*], (),
  /* -------------- */

  [John], [Second St.], [180 cm], [5],
  [Wally], [Third Av.], [160 cm], [10],
  [Jason], [Some St.], [150 cm], [15],
  [Robert], [123 Av.], [190 cm], [20],
  [Other], [Unknown St.], [170 cm], [25],
),
  kind: table,
  caption: [milan],
)
]

#figure(
table(
  columns: 3,
  gutter: 3pt,
  [Name], [Age], [Strength],
  [Hannes], [36], [Grace],
  [Irma], [50], [Resourcefulness],
  [Vikram], [49], [Perseverance],
),
  kind: table,
  caption: [hello],
)
```

### Materiálové vlastnosti

```{python}
import sympy as sy
# sy.init_printing()
from IPython.display import display, Math
```

#### Materiál 12022

Teplotný rozsah
```{python}
t_12022=sy.var('T_{12022}')
t_12022_values = [20,100,200,250,300,350,400,450]
# Format the output in LaTeX
latex_output = f"${t_12022} = {t_12022_values}$"
# Render the LaTeX expression as a math equation
display(Math(latex_output))
```

Medza klzu
```{python}
rp02_12022=sy.var('R_{p02-12022}')
rp02_12022_values = [255, 245, 225, 205, 177, 157, 137, 117]
latex_output = f"${rp02_12022} = {rp02_12022_values}$"
display(Math(latex_output))
```

Medza pevnosti
```{python}
rm_12022=sy.var('R_{m-12022}')
rm_12022_values = 440
latex_output = f"${rm_12022} = {rm_12022_values}$"
display(Math(latex_output))
```

##### Medza pevnosti pri tečení (200 000 h)
Teplotný rozsah

```{python}
tt_12022=sy.var('T_{t-12022}')
tt_12022_values = [380, 400, 420, 440, 460, 480, 500]
latex_output = f"${tt_12022} = {tt_12022_values}$"
display(Math(latex_output))
```

Medza pevnosti pri tečení
```{python}
rmt_12022=sy.var('R_{mt-12022}')
rmt_12022_values = [145, 115, 89, 67, 48, 33.4, 24]
latex_output = f"${rmt_12022} = {rmt_12022_values}$"
display(Math(latex_output))
```
